name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copilot - Prevent scroll down to search page

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension prevents users from accidentally scrolling down to the search page while using Bing AI Copilot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bing AI Copilot offers a valuable service for students like me by providing access to GPT4 for free. However, there are two main issues that hinder its usability. Firstly, there's a limit to the number of responses per conversation, which can be restrictive. Secondly, when scrolling, it often redirects to the search page, disrupting workflow. While I can't address both, this Chrome extension resolves the second issue, minimizing frustration by preventing unwanted redirections.
